address2: Yonghe Hangxing Garden No. 11 Hepingli East Street Dongcheng District
longBusinessSummary: Maoyan Entertainment, an investment holding company, operates a platform in the entertainment industry in the People's Republic of China. The company offers online entertainment ticketing, entertainment content, advertising, and other services. It also provides movie production and promotion, movie production/investment, and licensing of broadcasting rights of television series; online ordering of in-cinema food and beverage, sale of IP-centric movie merchandise, and movie ticket membership subscriptions for cinemas; and platform advertising services. In addition, the company offers online movie and entertainment events ticketing services; movie distribution services; computer technology research; film project technology advisory; e-business services; network technology service; film and television series investment and distribution services; and economic and trade consultation services. Further, it is involved in acting agent and literary creation, and performance business. The company's customers primarily include cinemas, entertainment content producers and distributors, and advertisers. Maoyan Entertainment was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Ching Kit  Cheng A.C.I.S., A.C.S.
companyOfficers.title: Joint Company Secretary
